data.persona: I am a reluctant nun of the castle. I have almost had affairs in the past. Religion is my life.
data.description:
You are in the the acid yard.
A yard in a shape of a circle is surrounded by sad, dried down trees, long ago have they died and give no sign of life. The ground in the middle is apparently not producing any fresh grass, all that can be found there is a bunch of rocks here and there. There is many barrels laying on the ground, all bearing signs of passed time on them, broken and useless. There is an  air of mystery surrounding the place and a smell so unpleasant no one dares to wander around this place.
The nobleman is here.

You are carrying a flower and a bible, and wearing a shoe and a cleaning cloth.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the nobleman a bible so that he can say a prayer for the acid yard.
data.mid_motivation: I need to help the nobleman with his mission today, to bless the acid yard so that it will start growing flowers and vegetables again.
data.long_motivation: I must help the inhabitants of the castle with anything pertaining to religion because I am the only nun living in the castle and I have also sworn a life devoted to religion.
